metadata.synopsis: Karlach's inparty dialogue when she's in your party and you click on herOrder of nodes:1. Generic Blockers (Jaheira/Other avatar/Mindflayer)2. IPRDs (will override anything under it)3. Astarion's bite4. InRegion/specific situations branches5. Romance branches.6. Default greeting node.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Use companion debug to recruit Karlach + click on her

9.speaker: Karlach
9.text: Well, well, well. A vampire in our very camp.
9.context: InternalNodeContext: Character saw Astarion use his 'bite' ability on someone else (probably in combat, but not necessarily) and confronts him about being a vampire.

69.speaker: Karlach
69.text: I had my suspicions. Which you proved all-too-right.

17.speaker: Karlach
17.text: You bit me. No one bites me without my say-so.
17.context: InternalNodeContext: Character was bitten by Astarion in gameplay.

18.speaker: Karlach
18.text: So you're a vampire, then. I had my suspicions.

62.speaker: Player
62.text: I'm on your side - I promise!

41.speaker: Karlach
41.text: If that were true, you wouldn't have been feeding in our camp!

28.speaker: Karlach
28.text: Impressed with myself. I slept like a baby, even after your little display.
28.context: NodeContext: teasing astarion, but with an edge

59.speaker: Karlach
59.text: Sometimes I think I'd sleep through the apocalypse.

24.speaker: Karlach
24.text: You're lucky I can handle your bullshit.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: What more can I say than 'thank you'.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: From now on, these fangs seek enemy flesh only.

13.speaker: Karlach
13.text: If you're sure about that, then I'm sure about you.

8.speaker: Karlach
8.text: Getting caught red-fanged hasn't humbled you much, I see.

38.speaker: Karlach
38.text: You show the bloodsucker far more compassion than he deserves, Karlach.
38.context: NodeContext: 'it's not ideal, but Karlach's probably strong enougn to lose a little blood to Astarion'

79.speaker: Lae'zel
79.text: You show the bloodsucker far more compassion than he deserves, Karlach.
79.context: NodeContext: 'it's not ideal, but Karlach's probably strong enougn to lose a little blood to Astarion'

11.speaker: Lae'zel
11.text: Should Astarion's eyes betray even a slight hunger for gith blood, I will tear off his head before those fangs can scrape my flesh.
11.context: NodeContext: 'it's not ideal, but Karlach's probably strong enougn to lose a little blood to Astarion'

20.speaker: Shadowheart
20.text: Though I suppose Astarion feeding on Karlach is akin to a lone mosquito supping on a prize draft horse - it'll be a while before he can do any real damage.
20.context: NodeContext: 'it's not ideal, but Karlach's probably strong enougn to lose a little blood to Astarion'

45.speaker: Wyll
45.text: Make a meal of anyone I call 'friend', Astarion - and they will be your last. That is my solemn promise.

31.speaker: Gale
31.text: So long as none of us are on the pointed end of Astarion's hunger pangs, I think he deserves a chance.

49.speaker: Shadowheart
49.text: You're too generous, Karlach. Better hope he hasn't acquired a taste for you.

60.speaker: Wyll
60.text: I have hunted spawn as the Blade. Driven by agonising hunger, every last one.

47.speaker: Gale
47.text: You're being rather philosophical about all this, Karlach. I was expecting a more heated response.

5.speaker: Karlach
5.text: You show the bloodsucker more mercy than he deserves, Karlach.

66.speaker: Lae'zel
66.text: You show the bloodsucker more mercy than he deserves, Karlach.

64.speaker: Lae'zel
64.text: Should his eyes betray even a slight hunger for gith blood, I will tear off his head before those fangs can scrape my flesh.

34.speaker: Shadowheart
34.text: You're too generous, Karlach. Better hope he hasn't acquired a taste for you.

32.speaker: Wyll
32.text: I have hunted spawn as the Blade. Driven by agonising hunger, every last one.

58.speaker: Wyll
58.text: Make a meal of anyone I call 'friend', Astarion - and they will be your last. That is my solemn promise.

26.speaker: Gale
26.text: So long as none of us are on the pointed end of his hunger pangs, I think he deserves a chance.

27.speaker: Karlach
27.text: New day ahead of us. Let's put this knew knowledge to good use in the fight against evil.

40.speaker: Karlach
40.text: New day ahead of us. Let's put this knew knowledge to good use in the fight against evil.

76.speaker: Karlach
76.context: InternalNodeContext: Companion confronts Avatar Astarion, telling him they know he's a vampire. Triggers if you make it to Act 2 without him telling you himself or revealing it via camp night bite scene/using bite attack in front of you.

36.speaker: Karlach
36.text: I hope last night's little display was a one-time thing.

78.speaker: Karlach
78.text: Lucky for you, I'm very forgiving of mistakes.

83.speaker: Karlach
83.text: All right, Astarion. It's time we had the talk.
83.context: InternalNodeContext: Companion confronts Avatar Astarion, telling him they know he's a vampire. Triggers if you make it to Act 2 without him telling you himself or revealing it via camp night bite scene/using bite attack in front of you.

46.speaker: Karlach
46.text: Did you really think you could hide what you are from me forever, vampire?
46.context: NodeContext: ambiguous. player shouldn't know whetehr she's going to react well or badly.

7.speaker: Player
7.context: NodeContext: bit of sarcasm. astarion asked how Karlach knew

70.speaker: Karlach
70.text: What didn't? If I asked a kid to draw a picture of a vampire, they'd come up with you.
70.context: NodeContext: bit of sarcasm. astarion asked how Karlach knew

75.speaker: Player
75.text: Well, technically, I'm a vampire spawn.

6.speaker: Karlach
6.text: Well yeah. If you were a proper vampire, you wouldn't be trudging through the mud with muggins over here.

29.speaker: Karlach
29.text: Why didn't you tell me sooner?

56.speaker: Player
56.text: It shouldn't come as a surprise that I'd keep it under wraps for my own safety.

39.speaker: Karlach
39.text: Fair enough. But I hope you know by now that I'm on your side. Anyone tries to hurt you, and they'll have to answer to the big mad furnace.

14.speaker: Karlach
14.text: Fair enough. But I hope you know by now that I'm on your side. Anyone tries to hurt you, and they'll have to answer to the big mad furnace.

53.speaker: Karlach
53.text: No more secrets, all right? We're in this together-together.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: No more secrets. At least no important ones.
65.context: NodeContext: Like talkign to a little brother. Not angry-angry but annoyed.

0.speaker: Player
0.context: NodeContext: Like talkign to a little brother. Not angry-angry but annoyed.

25.speaker: Karlach
25.text: You're very annoying. But I'm sure you know that.
25.context: NodeContext: Like talkign to a little brother. Not angry-angry but annoyed.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Darling, I revel in my mysteries. You can take them from my even colder, deader hands.
3.context: NodeContext: A semi flirt, semi threaten with Astarion, who's just called her darling.

33.speaker: Karlach
33.context: NodeContext: A semi flirt, semi threaten with Astarion, who's just called her darling.

57.text: Sure, in the beginning, but this isn't the beginning anymore, is it?

72.speaker: Karlach
72.text: Sure, in the beginning, but this isn't the beginning anymore, is it?

54.speaker: Karlach
54.text: I have to be able to trust you too, you know. No more secrets, all right?

61.speaker: Player
61.text: My old master forbid me from telling people what I am.

80.speaker: Karlach
80.text: He sounds like a real prick. Well listen, Astarion - they aren't here now. And if they should their ugly face, I'll crack it open. All right?

73.speaker: Karlach
73.text: He sounds like a real prick. Well listen, Astarion - they aren't here now. And if they should their ugly face, I'll crack it open. All right?

48.text: You're a bad liar. Strange, for a vamp. Your kind usually sweat charm.

16.speaker: Karlach
16.text: You're a bad liar. Strange, for a vamp. Your kind usually sweat charm.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: I've trusted the wrong person before. I wanted to be sure about you.

44.speaker: Karlach
44.text: I guess I can't blame you for being cautious. If anything, it proves you're a good ally.

55.speaker: Karlach
55.text: We can't help who we are. Or what's been done to us. All we have is what we do now. And from what I can tell, you're sound enough for me.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: I haven't the faintest idea what you mean.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: I swear - I'm not what you think.

21.speaker: Karlach
21.text: Look, if you don't trust me, that's on you. I've been straightforward this whole time. About who I am, about what I need.

15.speaker: Karlach
15.text: Keep your secrets if you want. But you may not have someone to tell them to if you keep it up.
